footerData.author: Al Asad Nur Riyad
footerData.aboutAuthor: Hi! I am Riyad, a Tech enthusiast, problem solver, and software engineer. Currently working at Appscode Inc.
footerData.authorInterest: I have a fair amount of knowledge of Javascript, Typescript, VueJs, and Nuxt. If you have an interesting idea, either open source or paid, let's connect.
footerData.aboutTheSite: This is a personal blog site built with Nuxt3, TailwindCSS, NuxtContent, Nuxt Icon. Currently it's deployed on Vercel.

homePage.title: Welcome To My Blog Site
homePage.description: Get Web Development, Javascript, Typescript, NodeJs, Vue, and Nuxt, Related Articles, Tips, Learning resources and more.

blogsPage.title: All Blogs
blogsPage.description: Here you will find all the blog posts I have written & published on this site.

aboutPage.title: Al Asad Nur Riyad
aboutPage.description: Software Engineer, Problem Solver, Web Enthusiast.
aboutPage.aboutMe: Hello, fellow human! I'm a software wizard who spends most of his day crafting code spells at AppsCode in the Bytebuilders team. When I'm not crafting code, you can find me summoning solutions to problems on online judges. Just don't ask me to cast any love spells, my magic only works on machines!
